name: BirbRunner
description:
Imagine you’re a birb. With human legs. Wearing pants. Running in a synthwave-inspired world. Birb Runner is a 3D game where you play as a hybrid bird navigating through challenging platforms and obstacles in a world driven by music where your movements are synced with the rhythm!

  • Controls: 
    • A/D or Left/Right arrows keys = move
    • Space bar = jump
  • Status: Available on PC and Mac.
  • Showcased in and livestreamed at USC Games Expo 2020.
  • Contact information of team:
    • Joanna Shen
    • Roahith Rajendiran
    • Justin Schornstein
